description.title: About Lakme Salon
description.text: Lakmé Salon, India’s first and leading chain of beauty salons, offers expert services in hairstyling, skin and beauty care. It is dedicated to the contemporary Indian woman’s exploration of the fine art of beauty. Known for our magical concoction of stunning make-up, fabulous hair and excellent skin services, we bring the backstage expertise and experience of Lakmé Fashion Week to modern Indian women through a team of over 3500+ highly trained professional stylists. Lakmé Salons are dedicated towards the evolvement of the modern Indian woman and her exploration of beauty. Professionally trained hair and makeup experts with countless shows under our belt and outstanding skin services come together at Lakmé Salon and offer an unforgettable experience.
